alert.note: Alert for Inland Hernando; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sumter and eastern Hernando Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Bushnell to 9 miles west of Mascotte. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wildwood, Bushnell, Hill n Dale, Lake Panasoffkee, Ridge Manor, Center Hill, Webster, Coleman, Rutland, Wahoo, Adamsville, Tarrytown, Sumterville, Spring Lake, Nobleton, and Croom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
